bug.author: alexDeCastroAtGit
bug.summary: #issue: broken or outdated link link for NLP tutorial
bug.description:
The second link, in the highlights session of the webpage <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/word2vec>Vector Representations</denchmark-link>
is broken or outdated. This is the link that's not working (404 from github) <denchmark-link:https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow_models/tutorials/embedding/word2vec.py>https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow_models/tutorials/embedding/word2vec.py</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Another broken link in the same page: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow_models/tutorials/embedding/word2vec_optimized.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow_models/tutorials/embedding/word2vec_optimized.py</denchmark-link>

Actually this is already fixed in the latest 1.2 docs: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.2/tutorials/word2vec>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.2/tutorials/word2vec</denchmark-link>
This will be fixed in the main docs when we switch them over to the 1.2 docs.

Wait, but I still see a broken link to <denchmark-link:https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow_models/tutorials/embedding/word2vec.py>https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow_models/tutorials/embedding/word2vec.py</denchmark-link> in the 1.2 doc; that 404's for me, so are you sure this is fixed?
Ah you're right, still looks broken (although in a different way!).
Also this bug is a duplicate of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/9905>#9905</denchmark-link> if I'm not mistaken.
Thanks, closing this as a duplicate of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/9905>#9905</denchmark-link> please reopen if there's still a problem when that one is closed.
